name: Undelivered VR
description:
Undelivered is a short(~30 min) VR horror game about delivering mail in a hotel. 

You play as a delivery person in a oddly designed hotel. Each floor you are required to deliver a piece of mail to its correct room, and then make it back to the elevator. 

The Elevator is safe. It will not fall.

This project was based on a re-occurring dream I've had, and was completed in a week.

Requires Steam VR  - HTC Vive, Valve Index

Warning - Contains flashing lights, and a few jump-scares

Supports teleportation or joystick movement.

You can change the settings for movement and effects by ringing the bells in the lobby.
